amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that 25 percent of the board of directors of local housing authorities be residents of public housing or persons receiving Federal rental assistance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 as printed in the Congressional Record. An amendment which would require that 25% of the board of directors of local housing authorities be residents of public housing or persons receiving federal rental assistance. The bill requires that at least one member of each housing authority's board of directors be a tenant of public or assisted housing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fields (LA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 254 (Roll no. 154).
